1079123661762764802.text: “Mostly what people are thinking about now, are building layers on top that plug the holes. Things like mixnets that insolate one thing from another. Reinvienting stuff is really hard and tends to not go as well as you think.” @jeffburdges #35c3

1079123659669803010.text: ”More incentives for developers because they can build on top of it immediately.” @musalbas

1079123656205365248.text: “It’s about usability. One of the known researchers in cryptography says he doesn’t even keep his keys, and so, can’t open encrypted emails. So how can activists be expected to do this when they’re the most in danger and in need of these technologies?” @InessBeng

1079123654640889858.text: ”We already have key management on these devices why not add encrypted messaging” @VladZamfir #35c3
